parameters: Blacksmith Eleo: Sorry, I'm currently preparing.

Blacksmith Eleo: Please hand the luggage over to Agonia-
san.

Blacksmith Eleo: Once that's done, it's time to reopen the
blacksmith shop.
Blacksmith Eleo: Who are you? I don't recognize your face.
Clea: I'm temporary member Clea. Nice to meet you.

Blacksmith Eleo: Oh, so you're the one who's rumored to be a
dragon slayer and went through the trouble of joining the
Adventurer's Guild.
Clea: Don't you think there are dragons?

Blacksmith Eleo: That's just a myth, but I'd like to test if
my weapons would work if they really existed.
Clea: Please count on me at that time.

Blacksmith Eleo: You're an interesting girl. Let me borrow
your greatsword and see.

Blacksmith Eleo: ...Oh, it's just iron ore? Well, I'll do it
as a special service this time.
Blacksmith Eleo: Don't hold back, hand over your weapon.

Blacksmith Eleo: Is this the miraculous power of Eleo-sama?
Did you come here to greet me or something?
Clea: The guild master asked me to collect some items.

Blacksmith Eleo: Ah, I see. Please give this to Agonia-san
for me.

Blacksmith Eleo: Please hand the luggage over to Agonia-
san.

Blacksmith Eleo: Once that's done, it's time to reopen the
blacksmith shop.
Blacksmith Eleo: Which one do you want to enhance?
実績 冒険者の相棒
実績 魔術士の相棒
Clea: This is a delivery from the armor shop.

Blacksmith Elero: I'm glad it's not a delivery from that
noisy old man.

Stolge of Affection: It seems like the city tour is over,
huh.
Clea: I won't forget about the dragon, okay?

Stolge of Affection: Haha, scary, scary! So, did you hear
various things from the people in the city?
Thief Nora: I received tea and snacks!
Clea: I felt that I am trusted quite a lot.

Clea: I learned about the Adventurer's Guild that I didn't
know about.

Stolge of Affection: If you want to achieve your goals, you
need to have an interest in various things.

Stolge of Affection: Being an adventurer means that even the
smallest piece of information can make a difference between
life and death.

Stolge of Affection: There's a saying that goes 'haste makes
waste,' so get to know about the guild, the city, and the
people.

Stolge of Affection: That will become the power to fulfill
your purpose someday.

Blacksmith Elero: Geez, this is why Stolge always talks so
much about benevolence.

Stolge of Affection: You're meddling too much, Elero the
Hangman.

Blacksmith Elero: Hey, stop talking about that! I've
received the package, so you can go back now!
Blacksmith Eleo: Which one do you want to enhance?
実績 冒険者の相棒
実績 魔術士の相棒
Blacksmith Eleo: Which one do you want to enhance?
実績 冒険者の相棒
実績 魔術士の相棒

Blacksmith Eleo: Hey, sorry for bothering you when you're
busy.
Clea: No, it's not a problem. Do you need something?

Blacksmith Eleo: I heard you're going to fight a dragon, so
I thought I'd adjust your weapons...

Blacksmith Eleo: Even so, the opponent is a dragon... I'm
not sure which direction to adjust it in...

Blacksmith Eleo: Is its skin hard or soft... Should I shape
it for cutting or for striking...

Blacksmith Eleo: I don't want it to break in a big fight...
What should I do?
Clea: Um... would this sword be helpful as a reference?

Clea: That day, it was the sword that my father used to
challenge the dragon and broke.

Clea: To never forget that day... I kept it as a memento of
my father and mother.

Blacksmith Eleo: This one might be useful! If I understand
how it broke, I can see which direction to forge it in!

Blacksmith Eleo: Would it be alright if I use the broken
sword?
Clea: Yes, I think both of them want that too.
Blacksmith Eleo: Is it okay if I don't take a break?

Clea: Yes, it's fine. Besides, the sound of it being struck
is quite satisfying.
Blacksmith Eleo: You're quite peculiar, aren't you?
Blacksmith Eleo: Was your father in the Imperial Army?

Clea: I don't know the details... but in my memories, my
father was a kind person who loved gardening.

Blacksmith Eleo: I was curious because the handle of the
broken sword doesn't seem like something a conscripted
person would handle.
Blacksmith Eleo: Hey, do you know the legend of the dragon?

Blacksmith Eleo: I heard that dragons only exist as males.
They were created by demons as creatures solely for
fighting.

Blacksmith Eleo: Because I have poor eyesight, I believe
that all flying creatures are female. They are pitiful
creatures who don't know about courtship behavior and end up
killing their partners...

Blacksmith Eleo: According to the myth, there's a story
about a large bird that mistakenly descended to the ground
thinking it was female, only to be defeated by a hero.
Blacksmith Eleo: You won't lose to a dragon, you know.

Blacksmith Eleo: You were born from something that could
never obtain a dragon in its lifetime.

Blacksmith Eleo: Kill a dragon and prove how much you have
been loved by your parents, Clea.
Clea: Yes! Thank you very much!
Blacksmith Eleo: H-hey... I'm not gonna die, you know.

Blacksmith Eleo: This is a new sword made from a broken
sword.

Blacksmith Eleo: This is a weapon exclusively for dragons,
designed for short-term battles. So never use it on anything
other than a dragon.

Blacksmith Eleo: Keep it with you until you face the dragon,
not as equipment, but as something precious.

Blacksmith Eleo: Don't neglect the maintenance of your
weapon. If you want to strengthen it, don't hesitate to come
to me.

Blacksmith Eleo: Are you looking forward to the story of
killing a dragon?
Blacksmith Eleo: Which one do you want to enhance?
実績 冒険者の相棒
実績 魔術士の相棒
Clea: Let's make Eleo's dream come true together.

Blacksmith Eleo: That newbie...she's started saying things
that make me cry...

Blacksmith Eleo: Alright, which weapon are we going to
strengthen?
実績 冒険者の相棒
実績 魔術士の相棒

Blacksmith Eleo: Alright, which weapon do you want to
enhance?
実績 冒険者の相棒
実績 魔術士の相棒
武器強化時のイベントを仮置き

Blacksmith Eleo: This is my limit... I've poured out all of
my past experiences, sensations, and everything I've
learned...!
Blacksmith Eleo: So, how does it compare to before?

Clea: It's a sensation that sticks to my hand, as if it has
become one with my own hand...

Thief Nora: Me too! It's a really interesting sensation,
like my arm has stretched out a lot!

Mage Relm: It's a word that I don't want to use lightly, but
it truly feels like a divine skill, a sensation as if magic
power is overflowing.

Priestess Sophia: I feel the same way. I sense a magical
power welling up from the depths of my stomach.
Blacksmith Eleo: Hehe, I'm glad to hear you say that.

Blacksmith Eleo: That's right, I should give you some kind
of reward!

Clea: Please accept this as a reward for strengthening our
weapons for free.

Blacksmith Eleo: There's no way I'm letting you go like
that! You've fulfilled my lifelong dream!

Clea: Then... could you please tell me about the title of
'The Hangman'?

Blacksmith Eleo: It's an incredible reward... but you're the
ones who went this far for me.

Stolge of Affection: Isn't this quite a nostalgic story,
Eleo?

Simos of the Unknown Night: Hehe, you were truly hilarious
back then!

Guild Master Agonia: Eleo was a skilled blacksmith even back
then, but her temperament brought upon the resentment of the
nobles.

Guild Master Agonia: One day, Eleo received a commission to
create a great axe. It seems she was drawn to the idea of an
axe that could sever fate.

Simos of the Unknown Night: Without knowing that it was
meant to cut off my own head.

Guild Master Agonia: Just before having her head cut off,
Eleo angrily shouted at the nobles, 'Don't defile this
beautiful axe with my blood!'

Guild Master Agonia: Because of that, it was changed to
hanging, and thanks to that, we were able to rescue you in
time.

Stolge of Affection: Well, it was just a coincidence that we
were able to save Eleo because we were dealing with
something else.
Blacksmith Eleo: It's such a boring story, isn't it?

Blacksmith Eleo: The most boring part is being treated to
drinks every time this story is told!

Simos of the Unknown Night: Don't you understand? I'm
looking forward to tonight, you know?

Blacksmith Eleo: Geez, it's become such a loose feeling. Is
this really the kind of pathetic reward that's acceptable?
Clea: Yes, I received a new partner.

Blacksmith Eleo: A partner, huh? That sounds nice. Take good
care of it, it's my masterpiece!
3.イベント後のプレイヤーの位置
実績 彼女たちの相棒

Blacksmith Eleo: Partner, it's a nice ring to it. Please use
it carefully, as it is my greatest masterpiece!
変数の順番修正に時間がかかるため
ここはスイッチにて対応する。
Celis of the Swift Wind: ...It's been a while, hasn't it?
Clea: Yes! Thank you for recommending me!
Clea: Finally, our comrades have gathered, and so, and so--

Celis of the Swift Wind: You've really worked hard and
become reliable. I can't call you Clea-chan anymore.

Clea: Please call me Clea! I wanted to return the favor, so
here's the Adventurer Guild temporary membership card.

Celis of the Swift Wind: I'll still hold onto it. Consider
it a charm. When Clea finds her dream, she can return it to
me then.

Mage Relm: Who is that person? I can tell they're quite
skilled, but I wonder who they are.

Thief Nora: Same hair color. They look like sisters, don't
they?

Priestess Sophia: That expression... They must be an
important person to Clea-chan, right?

Guild Master Agonia: Well then, let us now proceed with the
Adventurer Guild membership ceremony.

Guild Master Agonia: Having completed all the rigorous
trials, a new member will be joining the prestigious
Adventurer Guild, Futeira.
Guild Master Agonia: Clea, come forward.

Guild Master Agonia: From now on, I will have you make a
pledge to all of your fellow guild members.

Guild Master Agonia: Not only to your current comrades, but
also to all the past members of the Adventurer Guild
Futeira.

Guild Master Agonia: Please understand the meaning and
repeat my words.

Guild Master Agonia: I pledge to all the comrades of the
Adventurer Guild Futeira, both current and past.

Guild Master Agonia: I will never betray my comrades or
clients.
I will never betray my comrades or clients
「私はけして仲間を依頼者を裏切らない」

Guild Master Agonia: I will never lie to my comrades or
clients.
I will never lie to my comrades or clients
「私はけして仲間に依頼者に嘘をつかない」

Guild Master Agonia: I will never run away from threats or
the truth.
I will never run away from threats or the truth
「私はけして脅威からも真実からも逃げ出さない」

Guild Master Agonia: Very well, all the comrades present
here are witnesses. The Adventurer Guild Futeira welcomes
you as a full member.

Guild Master Agonia: Does anyone have any objections to her
membership?

Clea: Thank you very much. I pledge to fight for the
Adventurer Guild Futeira.

Guild Master Agonia: Congratulations, Clea. From today
onwards, you are a member of the Adventurer Guild Futeira.

Guild Master Agonia: I look forward to your achievements as
an adventurer.
実績 駆け出し冒険者

Guild Master Agonia: This is a small celebration for
becoming a full member. Please have Elelo enhance your
weapons for the future.
Guild Master Agonia: Now, let's talk about what comes next--

Simos of the Unknown Night: I have an objection, Guild
Master-sama. Or perhaps Simos-sama's opinion cannot be
heard?

Guild Master Agonia: Oh my, I thought I could take care of
this while you were away.

Simos of the Unknown Night: Hey hey... Another woman joining
the guild? Is this the true nature of the reform that the
old hag promised?

Simos of the Unknown Night: Or are you planning to turn the
Adventurer Guild into a brothel and sell yourself to the
senators, Agonia?

Mage Relm: Hey, what's with this sudden celebration all of a
sudden!?

Simos of the Unknown Night: I'll tear you apart, little
girl.
Stolge of Affection: Hey hey, that's enough!

Stolge of Affection: Just like you and me in the past, Clea
has shown us courage and determination.

Stolge of Affection: Are you doubting her? That would be a
blasphemy against the great widow.

Simos of the Unknown Night: Tch. As usual, you're all talk,
Stolge.

Stolge of Affection: You're not as good as him, Simos, you
musclehead.

Guild Leader Agonia: Clea is a novice adventurer starting
from today. Please ask Celis for more details.
Guild Leader Agonia: Well then, let's disband.

Celis, the Galewind: First of all, congratulations on
officially joining. Let's talk about what's going to happen
from now on.

Celis, the Galewind: Basically, the flow of receiving
requests through Piste-san remains the same as before, so
don't worry.

Celis, the Galewind: It will be up to the Guild Master's
decision, but once you complete a certain number of
requests, you will be able to challenge the promotion exam.

Celis, the Galewind: If you can successfully pass the exam,
you will need three more promotions to reach the goal of
dragon subjugation requests.
Clea: We still have a long way to go, don't we...

Celis, the Galewind: Since we have absolutely no information
about the dragon's whereabouts, I think we should just
complete requests while searching for the dragon.

Celis, the Galewind: I knew it wasn't a mistake to trust my
intuition that you would definitely come here and accomplish
it.

Celis, the Galewind: I haven't introduced myself yet. I am
Celis. Here, I am called by the nickname Galewind.

Thief Nora: I-I'm Nora! I-I've been taken care of by Clea-
san!

Mage Relm: I am Relm, the great genius of the Magic Academy!
Hehe, I am taking care of clumsy Clea-san.
Priestess Sophia: I am Priestess Sophia. Nice to meet you.
Galewind Celis: Hehe, please take care of this child.
Galewind Celis: Clea, let's meet at some request.
Clea: Yes. Now I can fight together with you.

Galewind Celis: Yes. I'm looking forward to it. After this
is over, let's go to Agonia-san's place.

Priestess Sophia: You're such a wonderful person, Clea-
chan.
Clea: Yes. You are my savior and the person I admire.
Clea: Let's go meet the guild leader.

events.name: セリスときどきアゴニア

parameters: CC Ut:画像ロード中はウェイト
Guild Leader Agonia: How was the exam up until now?

Stolge of Affection: I have high expectations for the
upcoming battles, but the amount of knowledge about the
ruins was astounding.
Stolge of Affection: Honestly, I was overwhelmed.

Clea: I have the same opinion. I think your ability to
investigate and analyze the ruins is amazing.

Guild Leader Agonia: I see... The most important thing in
battles is the strength of one's will.

Guild Leader Agonia: Especially for us adventurers in the
guild, defeat is absolutely not allowed for the sake of our
clients.

Guild Leader Agonia: And sometimes, we also need to overcome
unwanted battles...
Guild Leader Agonia: Ect, do you have that determination?

Girl Ect: I won't know until that time comes, but I will
fight for the sake of the guild and for my dream!

Guild Leader Agonia: Alright then, Ect, please ready your
weapon.

Guild Leader Agonia: Now, as the final exam, I will have
Clea fight against you.
3.イベント後のプレイヤーの位置
Guild Leader Agonia: Are you ready?
CC Ut:画像ロード中はウェイト
Clea: Sorry to keep you waiting, there's no problem.
Girl Ect: I-I'm really with Clea-san...
Girl Ect: But... I... will fight!
Girl Ect: Haa... haa... Thank you very much!
Clea: Thank you very much as well.

Guild Leader Agonia: I will confirm one last time, Ect. Are
you suitable for the Adventurer Guild, Futeira?

Clea: Her knowledge is genuine. I recommend her membership
once again.

Stolge of Affection: I agree, without any bias. It's natural
to have areas that need improvement. We should polish them
here.

Guild Leader Agonia: Ect, state the three principles of the
Adventurer Guild.
Girl Ect: I won't betray, I won't lie, and I won't run away.

Guild Leader Agonia: Very well, we will approve your
membership.

Girl Ect: Is it true!? Yay~ With this, Papa and my dream can
come true!

Guild Leader Agonia: Oh, well, is it alright? The guild
doesn't exist just for your sake, you know.

Guild Leader Agonia: Please never forget that we are here
together with the guild.
3.イベント後のプレイヤーの位置
Young girl Ect: I-I'm feeling nervous...
CC Ut:画像ロード中はウェイト

Young girl Ect: Thank you very much, Clea-san! Thanks to
your recommendation... we are now fellow adventurers!

Clea: Congratulations! From today onwards, I can't call you
Ect-chan anymore.

Young adventurer Ect: I will also introduce myself as an
adventurer from today!

Mage Relm: By the way, how is the investigation of the
gemstone we found earlier?

Mage Relm: If you're in trouble, I can investigate in your
place!

Thief Nora: No way! I was told that stealing someone else's
loot is third-rate!

Priestess Sophia: Oh my, I wonder how the genius mage will
respond?

Mage Relm: Grumble... But I don't think there's any other
way to investigate besides the academy, right?

Young adventurer Ect: I will do my best a little longer,
with my own hands!

Young adventurer Ect: This is an important bond with my
father...
Clea: I also think that would be good.

Young adventurer Ect: I want to go investigate the ruins
right away! There might be a clue about this gemstone.

Clea: It's important not to push yourself. This is advice
from a senior adventurer.
Priestess Sophia: Hehe, you seem happy to have a junior?

Young adventurer Ect: As an explorer and adventurer, please
take care of me again, everyone!
3.イベント後のプレイヤーの位置

Stolge of Affection: Just because the opponent is Ect,
doesn't mean we should go easy on her, you know?

Stolge of Affection: It doesn't suit you to be gloomy, you
know?

Stolge of Affection: I understand what you're thinking. Why
did the great widow choose Agonia?
Stolge of Affection: So you finally understand, huh?

Stolge of Affection: ...I'll do things my own way. Even
without the Guild Master, I can fulfill the widow's will.

Stolge of Affection: Haha, that's right! It's going to be a
big fight against the Empire, and we won't be lacking in
opponents.

Stolge of Affection: We have a formidable opponent as our
enemy. Let's prepare for a fight.
3.イベント後のプレイヤーの位置

Guild Leader Agonia: Thank you for coming. Please wait a
little for their arrival.

Guild Leader Agonia: It's amazing to sense the presence of a
master of tailing, as I heard from Stolge. Your growth is
truly remarkable.

Simos of the Unknown Night: I think you understand, but
tailing is just one of the skills of an adventurer.

Simos of the Unknown Night: In the end, strength is
essential for an excellent adventurer.

Clea: I think the same. I've come to realize that there are
many things that cannot be protected without being strong.

Guild Leader Agonia: Being excellent... is something with a
very ambiguous definition. In certain circumstances,
strength can turn into weakness.

Guild Leader Agonia: However, I can assert that being
excellent is important for the Adventurer's Guild.
Clea: Having the ability to always fulfill requests.

Guild Leader Agonia: That's right. The members of the
Adventurer's Guild need various kinds of [strength].

Guild Leader Agonia: As Simos mentioned, there are various
types of [strength] such as tailing ability, negotiation
ability, imagination, willpower, leadership...

Guild Leader Agonia: Clea, do you have the determination and
resolve to aim for greater heights as a member of the
Adventurer's Guild?

Clea: Of course. I also want to stand alongside Celis-san
and everyone else.

Simos of the Unknown Night: Haha, the little girl has
started talking like that, huh!
Simos of the Unknown Night: I'm honestly happy about this.

Clea: There is fear... but I am exhilarated by the prospect
of fighting Simos-san one-on-one.

Stolge of Affection: During the era of the Great Widow,
Agonia and Simos were the twin pillars of martial prowess.

Stolge of Affection: To defeat those two, this is the final
promotion exam of the Adventurer's Guild.

Stolge of Affection: Did you properly listen to the previous
conversation? Are you planning on not using what you
obtained during your adventures?

Clea: I will fight alongside my four companions. My journey
as an adventurer has been with them.

Guild Leader Agonia: If there is such a thing as
omnipotence...

Guild Leader Agonia: That is by no means an individual
endeavor. It should be done together with the organization
and your comrades.

Guild Leader Agonia: Exhaust everything you have struggled,
suffered, and fought for in all the previous quests.

Will you challenge the twin pillars of the Adventurer's
Guild, Futeira?

Guild Leader Agonia: Retreating is also sometimes a valid
choice. If you want to challenge, please talk to Simos who
is here.
Guild Leader Agonia: Very well... Show me.
Guild Leader Agonia: Clea, show me your strength!
3.イベント後のプレイヤーの位置

Guild Leader Agonia: Please challenge as many times as you
want. Please carefully discern what is lacking in yourself.

Do you want to challenge the Twin Pillars of the
Adventurer's Guild, Ftera?

Guild Leader Agonia: Retreating can also be an effective
choice. If you want to challenge, please talk to Shimos
here.
Guild Leader Agonia: Very well... Show me.
Guild Leader Agonia: Clea, show me your power!
3.イベント後のプレイヤーの位置

Guild Leader Agonia: Please challenge as many times as you
want. Make sure to carefully assess what you are lacking.
Clea: Haa... Haa... H-How... is this...?

Fuchiyo no Shimosu: Fuhahaha! That damn brat from back then
has grown this much, huh?

Fuchiyo no Shimosu: Agonia, you've really trained hard,
haven't you?

Guild Master Agonia: Facing herself and overcoming fear,
Clea has also managed to dispel the sense of emptiness that
comes after revenge.

Guild Master Agonia: The girl who carried a rusty greatsword
that day has grown enough to bear the burden of the
Adventurer's Guild...
Guild Master Agonia: This is truly a joyous occasion.

Guild Master Agonia: Clea, what are the three principles of
the Adventurer's Guild?
Clea: I won't betray, I won't lie, and I won't run away.

Guild Master Agonia: Let us acknowledge it. From today, you
are someone who stands alongside us, Clea, with your
strength.

Guild Master Agonia: From here on, please decide for
yourself the place you should aim for.
実績 三傑に並ぶ者

Clea: Understood. Thank you very much for accompanying me,
Guild Master and Guild Master Agonia.

Stolge of Affection: How about we have a drink together for
the first time in a while, after showing you something nice?

Receptionist Piste: Everyone! I finally managed to restore
it, your favorite dish!
Clea: Is this the dish that was restored from the recipe?
Clea: Everyone, you all look pale... Are you okay?

Guild Master Agonia: Oh no, I have administrative work to
do, so unfortunately I'll have to leave the cooking to all
of you. Well then--

Receptionist Piste: I have finished all the administrative
work.

Shimosu of the Unknown Night: Today, I'll leave it to Agonia
and the others. I have a request to beat up some thugs, if I
remember correctly--

Receptionist Piste: I have asked someone else to take care
of it.

Stolge of Affection: I have a report to give to the client,
which is very unfortunate, but today, please get along well
together.

Receptionist Piste: The client has arrived, so I have
already explained everything.

Receptionist Piste: Everyone, you're working too hard!
Today, I insist that you take a proper rest!

Receptionist Piste: Alright, let's start preparing the
tables! Clea-chan and everyone, please help out!

Shimosu of the Unknown Night: 'Stolge, isn't this your
responsibility? What happened to the sabotage operation to
make Piste's request fail?'

Stolge of Affection: With a smile on my face, I am going
around with Clea and the others to visit the great widow's
memorable places, you know!?
Stolge of Affection: Can you stop me?

Stolge of Affection: First of all, it's Agonia's fault for
not crushing the request form!

Guild Leader Agonia: I'm the same... I was finally reported
with a smile that the recipe has been found.

Guild Leader Agonia: If I were told to go on a little trip
with Clea-chan and the others, would I be able to crush the
request form?

Shimosu of the Unknown Night: I really hate doing sneaky
things, but how about we just pretend to go along with it
for now?
Guild Leader Agonia: Yes, it's impossible.

Guild Leader Agonia: We can't let this go any further. Let's
prepare ourselves as executives of the Adventurer's Guild.

Stolge of Affection: Yeah... fortunately, we have water, so
it's possible to pour it in.

Shimosu of the Unknown Night: Got it... Well then, let's go
on the count of three.
Shimosu of the Unknown Night: Why isn't anyone eating!?

Stolge of Affection: You're the one who isn't eating, aren't
you? Who are you to talk about others!

Guild Leader Agonia: It seems to be more of a trauma for us
than we imagined...

Shimosu of the Unknown Night: When we did something wrong, a
pie came out. Could it be a punishment for us as women?

Stolge of Affection: When I think about it, that smile from
back then seems like something else...

Guild Leader Agonia: Sigh, let's eat soon. Judging by
Piste's expression, she's on the verge of tears.

Shimosu of the Unknown Night: Well... I guess there's no
helping it. Let's go!

Stolge of Affection: It's a perfect reproduction, it tastes
absolutely terrible...

Shimosu of the Unknown Night: Ah, so this is what it feels
like under the devil's armpit.

Guild Leader Agonia: It's quite poetic, although it's
heading in the worst direction...
Shimosu of the Unknown Night: Hehe...

Guild Leader Agonia: It reminds me of those days when we
heard there were only three members in the thief guild, but
there were actually 30.

Shimosu of the Unknown Night: You left me behind and ran
away back then, didn't you!?

Stolge of Affection: Ahahaha, so Agonia ran away to where
there were 50 people, right?

Guild Leader Agonia: Oh, I thought I was going to die for
real back then. We were fearless and somehow managed to
survive.

Shimosu of the Unknown Night: You dumbass, it's because
there was a woman, you know!

Stolge of Affection: That's right, it's because that person
was there that we gathered and are still surviving.

Guild Leader Agonia: How close did we get to that great
widow on that day?

Guild Leader Agonia: Of course, I wonder if we exist for the
prayers of those who have no fangs and will never become the
same existence.

Shimosu of the Unknown Night: You can just confirm with that
old hag when you're dead. As long as we're alive, we'll just
keep crushing those worthless bastards.

Shimosu of the Unknown Night: Hey, you guys have some free
time today, right? I feel like my taste buds are dying, so
let's gulp down some wine for a palate cleanser.

Guild Leader Agonia: I agree, it's unlikely, but let's
escape before that tea arrives.

Stolge of Affection: Speaking of wine... do you know who
stole the high-quality wine that Shimosu was hiding?

Shimosu of the Unknown Night: It's that rookie, right!? I'm
still searching for the culprit, tell me at the bar!

Receptionist Piste: I'm glad, you seem to be having fun!
Restoring the recipe was definitely the right answer!
Thief Nora: Shimosu-san, you do smile, huh...

Mage Relm: I'm surprised even Guild Leader Agonia is
smiling.

Priestess Sophia: No matter how old he is, they still call
him a boy. But he really is innocent and seems to be
enjoying himself.

Clea: I wonder what they're talking about that makes them so
happy?

Receptionist Piste: It's definitely about the story of the
Great Widow! How she guided and raised the three of them in
the Adventurer's Guild...
Receptionist Piste: Maybe they see her as a mother figure?

Clea: Indeed, the mother of the three great figures of the
guild is truly [great], isn't she?

Receptionist Piste: I hope that the Adventurer's Guild, no
matter how much it changes, will always have the Great
Widow, who has always been an ally of the weak.
Clea: Yes, I think so too.
Receptionist Piste: Well then, I should serve some tea!

Receptionist Piste: I found a recipe too! I should deliver
it to them since it's something that the three of them will
surely be nostalgic about!
3.イベント後のプレイヤーの位置
実績 偉大なる未亡人

Blacksmith Eleo: You've come here often. How are the weapons
I forged holding up?

Clea: There are absolutely no problems. The more I train
with the weapons you forged, the more they feel like an
extension of my hand.

Blacksmith Eleo: I consider myself the best blacksmith in
the empire, and I can confidently say that the weapons I'm
currently handing over are top-notch.

Blacksmith Eleo: But... what I lack might be materials that
I'm not even sure exist.

Clea: I understand. So all we need to do is find those
materials, right?

Blacksmith Eleo: Did you hear? It might be something that
I'm not even sure exists.

Clea: There was a dragon that was said to not exist, but I
have resolved what was considered impossible.

Clea: I don't want to disregard people who desperately chase
their dreams. This should be the same thought not only for
me, but for all of my comrades.

Thief Nora: Leave it to me! I've managed to handle things
somehow, so please rest assured!

Mage Relm: That's not a very reassuring answer... Well, as
long as I'm here, please stay calm!

Priestess Sophia: Oh my, you're not much different from
Nora-chan, are you?

Blacksmith Eleo: If the materials are gathered... I will
forge your weapons, you foolish men before me.

Blacksmith Eleo: The desired materials are all things with
the name of a goddess, as far as I know. They are items that
only exist in literature.

Blacksmith Eleo: I can't even give you any clues... but
please somehow help me.

Mage Relm: How about asking Albus-san? If anyone knows the
location, it might be him with his knowledge.

Clea: Yes... Since we don't have any clues, let's start with
what we can do.
3.イベント後のプレイヤーの位置

Blacksmith Eleo: I'm sorry for tagging along with an old
man's dream... but please, count me in.
Blacksmith Eleo: Did you really manage to obtain it!?

Clea: The heart of Actina, the heart of Deirei, and the eyes
of Imiserinos.

Blacksmith Eleo: I only knew of its existence from the
records, but I can confidently assert that what is before me
is undoubtedly the real thing...!
Blacksmith Eleo: Now, all that's left is--

Clea: It all depends on Eleo's skills now. It's my first
time using these materials, but I believe in her.

Blacksmith Eleo: You've come a long way from being a novice.
Now, let's start preparing for the forging. Give me a shout
when you're ready!
3.イベント後のプレイヤーの位置
